virtual void GetGamePayoff (const Player *playerOne, int &playerOneScore, const Player *playerTwo, int &playerTwoScore)
 Function determining game payoff.

Detailed Description

The prisoner's dilemma game.

This is an implementation of the Prisoner's dilemma with payoff matrix: 

        C  D
     C [3, 0]
     D [5, 1]

Member Function Documentation

void PrisonerDilemma::GetGamePayoff ( const Player *  playerOne,
int &  playerOneScore,
const Player *  playerTwo,
int &  playerTwoScore 
) [protected, virtual]

Function determining game payoff.

This function will read playerOne.nextMove and playerTwo.nextMove to determine each player's score. The score earned is set as output in playerOneScore and playerTwoScore.

Parameters:
playerOneFirst player in game
[out]playerOneScoreScore the first player will receive this round
playerTwoSecond player in game
[out]playerTwoScoreScore the second player will receive this round

Implements Game.
